products.title: White Meat Tuna Flakes In Extra Virgin Olive Oil 185g
products.body_html:
Discover the amazing goodness of Tasty Nibbles White Meat Tuna Flakes in Extra Virgin Olive Oil! Our tuna flakes are made from only the finest white meat, sourced from the fishermen of the south Indian coast. The white meat tuna is prized for its delicate flavour and tender texture, making it a perfect ingredient for any meal.

We then carefully pack the white meat tuna flakes in extra virgin olive oil, which enhances the flavour of the tuna and provides numerous benefits. Sourced from one of the world's top producers, the oil is extracted from the first cold-pressing of olives. The result is a delicious and wholesome product that you can enjoy straight from the can.

Whether you're looking for a quick and easy lunch, a filling snack, or a flavour-packed addition to your favourite recipe, our white meat tuna flakes are the perfect choice.

So why wait? Try our White Meat Tuna Flakes with Extra Virgin Olive Oil today and experience the delicious taste and quality that you deserve.

Processed using advanced Japanese retort technology
No added preservatives
Ready-to-eat
Packed in import quality food grade tuna cans
Doesn’t require refrigeration until open.

100% convenience with zero wastage
HACCP, FSSAI, and Halal certified

products.title: Canned Tuna In Oil 500g
products.body_html:
Ideal in terms of convenience and value, Tasty Nibbles Tuna in Oil is a high quality, delicious and healthy staple seafood made from meticulously selected fresh wild-caught tuna using Japanese technology. Taste with health in the most convenient way is the essence of Tasty Nibbles Canned Tuna. 

  • Made according to the Japanese principles of manufacturing that have set world benchmarks for safety, hygiene and total process control
  • The cleaned, cooked, and Ready-to-Eat light meat tuna comes with a distinct aroma and taste
  • Canned with oil for added taste
  • Highly nutritious with a rich presence of Omega 3 fatty acids, proteins, vitamins and minerals 
  • The low carb /low-fat meat compliments the Keto diet and can be used by all age groups
  • Latest RETORT technology ensures 2-year shelf life at room temperature
  • The product has no added preservatives and additives
  • Very convenient to use with zero cleaning, cooking or waste
  • This any-time-complete-food comes in an easy-to-open flip can and is a good option while travelling
  • HACCP, FSSAI, Halal certified 

Uses

Tasty Nibbles Canned Tuna is a ready-to-eat and ready-to-use product that can directly be used with a variety of recipes – from salads to sandwiches, cutlets to spring rolls, and noodles to pasta.

So why wait? Add some heat and flavour to your next meal with Tasty Nibbles light meat tuna chunks in sunflower oil with chilli and cracked pepper.

products.title: Tuna Flakes in Tomato Sauce 185g
products.body_html:
Do you crave a touch of bold flavour to liven up your lunch or dinner? Then it's time to try Tasty Nibbles Tuna Flakes in Tomato Sauce!

Our Tuna Flakes in Tomato Sauce are made with only the freshest and finest tuna, simmered in a rich and flavorful tomato sauce. The result is a deliciously tangy and satisfying dish that is sure to become a staple in your kitchen.

Not only does our Tuna Flakes in Tomato Sauce taste amazing, but it's also incredibly versatile. You can enjoy it on its own, mixed with pasta, or even as a topping for a salad. It's the perfect way to add a touch of excitement to your meal.

Plus, our Tuna Flakes in Tomato Sauce are the perfect choice for anyone with dietary restrictions. Packed for a quick meal each tuna can is perfect for one meal for a person.

Why settle for bland and boring meals when you can add a touch of bold flavour with Tuna Flakes in Tomato Sauce? Try them today and discover the delicious difference.

products.title: Light Meat Tuna Chunks In Water 500g
products.body_html:
Try Tasty Nibbles Light Meat Tuna Chunks in Water today. Tasty Nibbles Tuna Chunks are made from only the finest light meat Tuna, responsibly sourced from experts in deep sea fishing. The light meat is prized for its delicate flavour and tender texture, making it a perfect ingredient for any meal.

We take pride in our preparation method, which involves carefully cooking the light meat tuna fish and packing chunks in UV-filtered water. This diligent process not only makes Tasty Nibbles tuna delicious but also preserves its texture. By being packed in water, our tuna is a great option for those who are conscious about what they eat.

Make a delightful choice! Try our Light Meat Tuna Chunks in Water today and discover the deliciousness that you've been searching for!
